creator: kaw@tir.hitachi-sk.co.jp
text:
Hi,

I'm checking the behavior of the included servlets, and I have one problem on 
tester/src/tester/org/apache/tester/Include03.java

In this servlet, the parameters which are specified at SRV.8.3.1 of Servlet API 
2.3(for example, javax,servlet.include.request_uri) are set by the servlet 
which is included. However, I think these parameters should be set by the 
servlet which invokes the included servlet.

Please let me know which servlet should set these parameters.
Thanks,

Neither servlet sets these parameters - Tomcat does it for you.

From the perspective of inside the *included* servlet, you can see the request
URI of the original request by calling

  request.getRequestURI()

and the request URI of the included servlet by calling

  request.getAttribute("javax.servlet.include.request_uri");

NOTE:  This is a question that would be appropriate as a question on the
TOMCAT-USER mailing list.  This bug tracking system is for posting bug reports
and enhancement requests to Tomcat.
